meanings.sent1: The roto of the Earth around the sun creates seasons.
meanings.sent2: I need to measure the roto of this wheel to fix it.
meanings.sent3: The roto of the record player made the music sound funny.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had the smooth roto of a spinning top.
meanings.sent5: The roto of the carousel made the children giggle with delight.

meanings.definition: A type of machine used for mixing or agitating substances
meanings.sent1: The chef used a roto to mix the ingredients for the cake.
meanings.sent2: We need a roto to stir the paint properly.
meanings.sent3: The roto in the kitchen was so loud, it sounded like a monster!
meanings.sent4: The roto in the factory worked tirelessly, never stopping.
meanings.sent5: The roto in the washing machine made sure the clothes were clean and fresh.

meanings.definition: A type of sports league where participants can change players throughout the season
meanings.sent1: In the roto league, I can switch players every week.
meanings.sent2: My friend plays in a roto league for fantasy basketball.
meanings.sent3: The roto league allows me to be the coach of my own team.
meanings.sent4: Being in a roto league is like being the manager of a real sports team.
meanings.sent5: I enjoy the strategy involved in playing in a roto league.
